```{r packages}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)
```

```{r import-data}
raw_data <- read_excel("../original/rsos161077supp1.xlsx", n_max = 111) %>%
  slice(-1) %>%
  select(
    Church = 1, Lights = 10,
    Date80 = 2, Number80 = 3, Status80 = 5, 
    Date16 = 6, Emerged16 = 7, Number16 = 8, Status16 = 11
  )
```
```{r}
datatable(raw_data)
```
